keyword: calories in a miller high life
title: Calories in a Miller High Life
meta_description: Learn calories in a Miller High Life beer (141 kcal per bottle), plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Miller High Life
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, 4.6% ABV lager beer, unopened and chilled; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics. Check labels or official sources when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Miller High Life has ~141 kcal, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Miller High Life Light
Serve in a 16 oz pint glass (33% more volume)
Add a splash of lime juice (1 tsp)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Miller High Life beer?
faqs.a: About 141 kcal per standard 12 oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Miller High Life?
faqs.a: Approximately 11.4 g of carbohydrates per bottle, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller High Life have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Trace protein (~0.9 g), but 0 g fat and no cholesterol.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Miller High Life?
Calories in Miller High Life vs. other beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many lagers; lighter versions like Miller Lite have fewer (~100 kcal).
